any of a family (Scincidae) of widely distributed lizards having an elongated, shiny body, smooth scales, and short legs, chiefly a) Mobouia quadrilineata, b) Eumeces isodactylus, c) Eumeces tapprobanensis, d) Tiliqua rubiventris, and e) Tiliqua pulchra.
a woman engaged in farming or belonging to the family of farmers.
a very foolish or stupid woman; a woman lacking basic knowledge.

the quality or state of being religiously, spiritually pure.
